name: Pidgeot

ability.name: Beating Wings
ability.effect: Once per turn, you may shuffle one of your Benched Pokemon and all cards attached to it into your deck.

attacks.name: Hurricane
attacks.effect: After doing damage, choose an opponent's Benched Pokemon to swap with their Active Pokemon.

flavor: Now that's a real fine Pokemon, real fine Pokemon. You can get yourself a first class partner there.
